import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Container,Row,Col } from 'reactstrap' import CommonSection from '../shared/CommonSection' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours.js' import TourCard from './../shared/TourCard' import Newsletter from './../shared/Newsletter' import SearchBar from './../shared/SearchBar' import '../styles/tours.css' const Tours = () => { const [pageCount, setPageCount] = useState(0); const [page,setPage] = useState(0); useEffect(()=>{ const pages = Math.ceil(5/8); //later we will use backend data count setPageCount(pages) },[page]) return <>
{ tourData?.map(tour=> ) }
{[...Array(pageCount).keys()].map(number=>( {number +1} ))}
} export default Tours
